name: The Exorcist's Wife
description:
English Only*

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

An exorcist dedicated to his work, spirit hunting and putting them down for rest is nothing out of the ordinary for Caius. There is nothing he loves more though than his wife, Uzuki, and their daughter, Kei. However, a mysterious figure followed Caius one day and tragedy struck the family. Caius now confronts his sorrow when his wife is no longer in his life... well as a human anyway...

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Game is currently a work in progress**

**More chapters and updates to be released in the future**
